nodes.text: Wooriids were an amphibious carnivore native to Glee Anselm, the home planet of Jedi Master Kit Fisto.

Wooriids had a slimy skin that discharged neurotoxins, which would paralyze aquatic birds that rested on the creature's back awaiting a chance to scavenge its leftovers, and turned the waterfowl into easy prey for the wooriid. Aquatic birds also picked the scraps from the beasts' maw, although thereby risked to be eaten by the wooriid itself.
Wooriids were first mentioned in the fifth issue of the comic book miniseries Star Wars: Jedi of the Republic – Mace Windu, written by Matt Owens and published on December 27, 2017 by Marvel Comics.
